Description:
Detects execution of the Notepad++ updater (gup) to launch other commands or executables

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Arbitrary Binary Execution Using GUP Utility
Query:
sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((parent_process_path like '%\gup.exe' and process_path like '%\explorer.exe') and  not (command = 'null' or (process_path like '%\explorer.exe' and command like '%
otepad++
otepad++.exe%') or parent_process_path like '%
otepad++\updater\%'))
